text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Mei, good work on the meeting.

Today's schedule is over, so
you can go home now──
──Then, I want to do some voluntary training!

......O-Okay......!
Of course, that's fine......!
Alrighty~!

The unit live is getting closer,
so I'm grateful for your enthusiasm.
That's one thing, but you know,
......let me share a little secret.

......So, me and Fuyuko-chan...
we've been doing secret practice......
...Is that so...

......Yeah......I wanted to surprise Asahi-chan...
by improving our dance skills......
...I see...
Oh, and of course, it's for the live performance song!

If our skills improve,
it'll be better overall, right?
Ah, that's right.

But now that I've heard that,
I'm curious too.

Ahaha, we'll show the best dance
during the actual performance!
